attributes.action: Vote of no confidence in Prime Minister Boris Johnson.
attributes.additional_details: We should either have a reelection with a public vote, or an MP vote of no confidence in PM Boris Johnson. He has behaved carelessly and broken many of the same rules that created himself - such as the 10 Downing Street parties. He needs to be removed from office.
attributes.background: Boris Johnson should lose his seat as the Prime Minister. He has broken many of the same rules that he imposed on the public, and is not leading our country by example.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for MPs or Ministers to be sacked or for them to resign.
